Name: Health
Subject: ['family and parenting', 'health and fitness', "men's health", 'children', 'disease']
Description: It is important for children learn about all aspects of their health. The Summit Health 5 program teaches students about how their bodies work and grow and how to live a healthy active lifestyle. They will also learn how to stay safe, how to handle emergencies, and about diseases, medicines, and unhealthy substances.
